text: Franz Ritter von Epp (October 16, 1868 in Munich â€“ December 31, 1946 in Munich) was a German politician and a military officer in the German Empire. Between 1928 and 1945 he was a member of the German Reichstag. From 1933 to 1945 he was the Reichsstatthalter of Bavaria. title: Franz Ritter von Epp
